EmailTemplate.description: Yr 7 info evening response to offered students
EmailTemplate.name: Explore Yr 7: offered students
EmailTemplate.subject: Explore Year 7: Thank You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Thank you for coming along to our Explore Year 7 information evening. We hope you found the evening informative and inspiring and enjoyed the demonstrations.
We trust everything is in order with your Offer of Enrolment paperwork. If so, we look forward to the return of the signed paperwork soon. If you need another copy of the paperwork please contact our Enrolments team on 9286 9579.
Tell us what you think! We would love your feedback and would appreciate your time in completing this survey:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/SACSExploreYr7
You can also keep up to date with what’s happening at St Andrew’s via our facebook page. It’s updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and videos.
We look forward to welcoming your family into our community at St Andrew’s Cathedral School.
Regards
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia direct +61 2 9286 9507 mobile 0418 255 923 email BPerry@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
